## Conventions

- Files prefixed with numbers (e.g. `01_`) define reading order.
- Placeholder tokens `{{repoName}}` and `{{version}}` are replaced at sync time.
- Do **not** edit generated files directly — run `pnpm -C agentkit agentkit:sync`
